title: Learning Trajectory (LT)-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Early Childhood Length Measurement Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories in early childhood mathematics education and classroom management experience
context.additional_context: In-service professionals learn to apply learning trajectory methods specialized in length measurement concepts for early childhood mathematics.

learning_goals: Learners can understand core principles of learning trajectories (LT) and systematically apply them to early childhood length measurement activities
Learners can diagnose current learner levels and design length measurement activities at appropriate difficulty levels
Learners can explain the impact of activity sequencing according to learning trajectories on learning effectiveness

resources: Length Measurement Instructional Set (Tape Measures, Blocks, Comparison Cards, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
